parse.title: List of South African actors and actresses

text.*:
See also: List of South Africans
This article is incomplete. This is because the article can be expanded with content from the following categories and their subcategories: Category:South African actors and Category:South African actresses.. Please help to improve it, or discuss the issue on the talk page. (June 2018)

This is a dynamic list and may never be able to satisfy particular standards for completeness. You can help by expanding it with reliably sourced entries.
